name: Star Shaman
description: Star Shaman is an action rogue-lite with visceral, movement-based spellcasting set in a distant and funky future. Your mission is to stop the brutalistic Architects of Entropy from orchestrating a final freeze of all existence in the universe. Travel through colorful and enchanting galaxies, wield empowering spells to fight off the Architects in tight combat sequences, then catch your breath as you admire the planets and moons you’ve successfully rejuvenated. Throughout your journey, you will meet well-intentioned and untrustworthy travelers and discover new spells and moves to master, enhancing your powers before beaming back out into space to pursue your quest: to bring the groove of life back to the most remote corners of the universe.
